questions.question: 1.The enzyme Papain is present in which of the following fruit family?
2.Which of the following are the applications of Papain?

answers.c: Useful for structural studies of enzymes

questions.question: 3.The applications of fragmented antibodies by papain are: a. Used in enzymatic synthesis of Amino acids b. Used for Antigen-Antibody Binding studies c. Used in Histochemical studies d. For Red Cell Serology
4.Which is the chemical used for the further treatment of cleaved fragments of antibody?
